data.title: LHS Foundation awards $242K in scholarships
data.meta_description: The Lahainaluna High School Foundation recently awarded 64 scholarships totaling $174,500 to 43 seniors from Lahainaluna High School’s Class of 2023, along wi
data.text:
The Lahainaluna High School Foundation recently awarded 64 scholarships totaling $174,500 to 43 seniors from Lahainaluna High School’s Class of 2023, along with an additional 12 renewable scholarships totaling $67,500 to Lahainaluna High School alumni.

The Class of 2023 recipients include Meleiana Shulman (University of Oregon), Gracia Acosta (University of Nevada, Las Vegas), Makenzie Alexander (Southwestern Oregon Community College), Maison Alexander (Southwestern Oregon Community College), Marc Cartagena (Pacific University), Belle Dagupion (Grand Canyon University), Richard Masuda (UH-Maui College), Cielo Fabrique (UNLV), Harry Flores (Pacific University), Shelsea Wurts (Lane Community College), Troy Concepcion (UH-Manoa), Kauikeolani Alo-Kaonohi Ah Loo (Chaminade University), Andrew Nguyen (Yale University), Travis Koyama (Oregon State University), Jeremy Kahahane-Lived (Universal Technical Institute), Joa Navarro (University of Utah), Jadelyn Fujii (UH-Manoa), Eden Healani Kanekoa (UH-Hilo), Danson Ke’alamokihana Lindsey (UH-Hilo), Mylei Kattil (Chaminade University), Jayse Koyama (Oregon Technical Institute), Makena Murphy (Mesa Community College), Tyreece Tadena (UH-Maui College), Lance Morikawa Jr. (Pacific University), Kathleen Baniqued (San Diego State University), Solomon Kana’au Castro (UH-Maui), Kade Cunningham (Hawaii Community College), Mauri’irani Niles-Cantero (UH-Hilo), Madison Yu-Cua (University of San Francisco), Drew Hufalar (UNLV), Mishalyn Ilmeng (UH-Manoa), Haley Mahoe (University of Pennsylvania), Blanche Abut (UH-Manoa), Destiny Larrobis (UNLV), Cash Palma (UNLV), Mico Corpuz (UH-Manoa), Timothy James Heile (Loyola Marymount), Charisse Abut (UNLV), Avery Dagupion (Lane Community College), Dwayne Jaymie Diga (UH-Manoa), Jack Fuqua (UH-Hilo), Frances Dangtayan (UH-Maui) and Kelvin Lam (UH-Manoa).

Alumni who received renewable scholarships include Challys Pascua (UH-Manoa), Kokoro Yamazaki (UH-Manoa), Kailani Medeiros-Sodetani (Rogue Community College), Rory Delaney (University of Massachusetts-Boston), Cael Yasutake (Columbia University), Kamele Detweiler (University of Notre Dame), Jumar Dela Cruz (UH-Maui), Angelina Lai (University of California at Irvine), Rory Delaney (University of Massachusetts-Boston) and Alexa Acosta (University of California at Irvine).

A $1,000 continuing education scholarship was also awarded to Lahainaluna teacher Jamie Eva Palakiko to further her studies.

For more information about the Lahainaluna High School Foundation and its scholarship program, visit www.lahainalunahighschoolfoundation.net or contact Art Fillazar at lhsf08@yahoo.com or (808) 661-5332.
